sentences: Ma arvasin, et see on hea mõte.
Ta arvas, et ma olen valesti aru saanud.
Nad arvasid, et see on tõsi.
context: The word 'arvasin' is the first person singular past tense form of the Estonian verb 'arvama', which means to think or suppose something. It is commonly used in sentences to express a thought or assumption that the speaker had in the past.
